evidence.claim: Steward utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure to support its applications and services.
Steward follows HIPAA compliance guidelines across its technology platforms for health data management.
The company integrates with various Electronic Health Records (EHRs) and supports FHIR standards for health data connectivity.
X12 EDI transactions are supported for billing and claims processing within their system.
Steward Health Care Network employs REST APIs for interoperability in health services.

icp.icp_reason: Active engagement in X12 transactions and health data exchange makes them an ideal ICP.
